remarks: An associative cancellation law for groups.  (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 25-Feb-2008.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
grpasscan1.1 $e |- X = ran G $.
grpasscan1.2 $e |- N = ( inv ` G ) $.
grpoasscan1 $p |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( A G ( ( N ` A ) G B ) ) = B ) $.
